AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.white Malibu sedan: a vehicle mentioned as a white sedan, involved in the incident at the Freer immigration checkpoint, lacked a wind farm sticker, designed to hold five people, stopped by Agent Trevino and found to be transporting illegals, registered to Dallas-Fort Worth as a rental vehicle, traveling in tandem with a black Dodge pickup truck, driven by RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR., sped away at around eighty miles per hour, rented from Hertz Dallas-Fort Worth, had two passengers sitting in front and three in back, including two hidden in the trunk
